Basic Drills.traditional: Step Chudan Zuki in Zenketsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Stepping Forward with middle punch in forward stance

Basic Drills.traditional: Step Mae Geri, Chudan Zuki in Zenketsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with middle front kick, land forward and follow up with middle punch in forward stance

Fighting Drills.english: Front hand jab in fighting stance
Middle reverse punch in fighting stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Kizami Zuki, Chudan Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Front hand jab, followed by reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.subCategory: Gohon Kumite Jodan in Zenkatsu Dachi (5 Step Attack and Defense with Partner)
requirements: Attacker steps forward with upper punch, defender steps back in mirror stance, blocks and counters.

Basic Drills.traditional: Step Chudan Gyaku Zuki in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with middle reverse punch in forward stance

Basic Drills.traditional: Step Mae Geri, Chudan Gyaku Zuki in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with middle front kick, land forward and follow up with middle reverse punch in forward stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Mawashi Geri, Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Roundhouse kick off the back leg, land forward and follow with reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.subCategory: Gohon Kumite Chudan in Zenkutsu Dachi (Five Step Attack & Defence with Partner)
requirements: Attacker steps forward with middle punch, defender steps back in mirror stance, blocks and counters.

Punches and Strikes.english: Elbow to the Side of the Head

Basic Drills.traditional: Chudan Mae Geri, Oi Zuki, Chudan Gyaku Zuki, Mae Gedan Barai in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with middle front kick, upper front punch, middle reverse punch, forward low block in forward stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Kizami Zuki, Heel Step Mawashi Geri, Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Front hand jab, leave it forward, heel step middle roundhouse kick, land forward and follow with middle reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.subCategory: Kihon Ippon Kumite in Zenkutsu Dachi (Basic One Step Sparring)
Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #1
requirements: Attacker steps forward with upper punch whilst defender steps back, blocks and counters.

Basic Drills.traditional: Chudan Uchi Uke, Kizami Zuki, Chudan Gyaku Zuki, Gedan Barai in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Middle inside out block, front hand jab, middle reverse punch and forward lower block in forward stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Chudan Gyaku Zuki, Rear Leg Chudan Mawashi Geri, Chudan Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Middle reverse punch, leave it out, roundhouse kick off the back leg landing forward and follow up with middle reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.subCategory: Kihon Ippon Kumite in Zenkutsu Dachi (Basic One Step Sparring)
Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #2
requirements: Attacker steps forward with upper punch whilst defender steps back, blocks and counters with a different method.

Basic Drills.traditional: Chudan Soto Uke, Uraken, Chudan Gyaku Zuki, Gedan Barai in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Middle outer-inner block, back fist strike to the temple, middle reverse punch and forward lower block in forward stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Mae Geri, Mawashi Geri, Chudan Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Prepare for a Forward front kick, then pivot into a roundhouse kick landing forward and follow up with middle reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.subCategory: Kihon Ippon Kumite in Zenkutsu Dachi (Basic One Step Sparring)
Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #3
requirements: Attacker steps forward with upper punch whilst defender steps back, blocks and counters with another method.

Basic Drills.traditional: Haito Uchi Uke, Shotei Uchi, Gyaku Zuki, Gedan Barai in Zenkutsu Dachi
Basic Drills.english: Inner outer ridgehand block, palm heel strike, middle reverse punch and lower block in forward stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Chudan Gyaku Zuki, Mawashi Geri, Ashi Barai, Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Middle reverse punch, rear leg roundhouse kick, foot sweep and follow up with reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #1
requirements: Attacker steps forward with front punch, defender breaks line 45 degrees and counters.

Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with triple middle punch with a slight pause after the first punch and then delivering two quick punches. Then stepping back into back stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Jodan Mawashi Geri, Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Keeping the same stance, lean back, upper roundhouse kick off the front leg, land forward and follow up with reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #2
requirements: Attacker steps forward with front punch, defender slides forward with a sweep and counters.

Basic Drills.english: Stepping forward with triple middle punch with a slight pause after the first punch and then delivering two quick punches. Then stepping back into horse riding stance

Fighting Drills.traditional: Jodan Mawashi Geri, Jodan Ura Ushiro Mawashi Geri, Gyaku Zuki in Kamae
Fighting Drills.english: Upper roundhouse kick off the back leg, spinning reverse roundhouse kick and follow up with reverse punch in fighting stance

Application / Demonstration / Impact.name: Jodan Oi Zuki #3
requirements: Attacker steps forward with front punch, defender breaks line 45-degrees and counters.

Kata.traditional: Demonstrate one section of bunkai from a Heian kata.

requirements: Attacker steps forward with upper punch and the defender steps back upper block. Attacker steps forward with middle punch and the defender steps back inner block. Attacker steps forward with a front kick and the defender steps back downward block.
